Address.Address1: SISLI MERKEZ MAH. ABIDEI HURRIYET CAD. 90

Description.Text: Listana is a stylish 4-star boutique hotel offering chic accommodation near the heart of Istanbul. Highlights include contemporary design, onsite dining, free Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and good transport links. Sisli is a cosmopolitan residential area towards the north of European Istanbul. It developed in the late 19th and early 20th-centuries and features many modern structures alongside several impressive Art Nouveau buildings. Nearby places of interest include BJK Inonu Stadium and the huge shopping mall, Istanbul Cevahir. Osmanbey metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Istanbul destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with a rooftop terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Comfort rooms are 21sqm and decorated in a bright, contemporary style. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV, safe and mini-bar. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The restaurant offers Turkish and international dishes in a sleek and sophisticated setting, while guests can enjoy a range of cocktails and snacks at the stylish Orchide bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
